devdoc.details: A contract for registering and verifying medicines and manufacturers

acceptOwnership().details: Completes the ownership transfer process Must be called by the pending owner

returns.isVerified: Boolean indicating if the manufacturer is verified
returns.licenseNumber: String license number of the manufacturer
returns.name: String name of the manufacturer

params._medicineId: The ID of the medicine to report

params._newOwner: The address to transfer ownership to

params._medicineId: ID of the medicine to update
